verses.text: "There are those who curse their fathers and do not bless their mothers;
those who are pure in their own eyes and yet are not cleansed of their filth;
those whose eyes are ever so haughty, whose glances are so disdainful;
those whose teeth are swords and whose jaws are set with knives to devour the poor from the earth, the needy from among mankind.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 30:12
rsbNotes.text: 30:12 clean in their own eyes. See 16:2; 21:2.
